Package photos.group4.controller

Interface Alerts

All Known Implementing Classes:
AdminSubsystemController, AlbumPhotoSearchController, LoginController, NonAdminSubsystemController, SelectedAlbumController, SelectedAlbumSlideshowController, SelectedPhotoDisplayController
public interface Alerts
Interface to allow re-use of different types of Alert messages All Controller Classes will implement
